reg_info.act_under: Government Advertising Act, 2004   Loi de 2004 sur la publicité gouvernementale

content.content: 1. The prescribed number of days within which the Auditor General is required by subsection 7 (1) of the Act to notify the head of a government office of the results of a review is seven days excluding Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.  O. Reg. 589/05, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The prescribed number of days within which the Auditor General is required by subsection 7 (1) of the Act to notify the head of a government office of the results of a review is seven days excluding Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.  O. Reg. 589/05, s. 1.

content.section: Notice of results of further review
content.content: 2. The prescribed number of days within which the Auditor General is required by subsection 8 (5) of the Act to notify the head of a government office of the results of a further review is seven days excluding Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.  O. Reg. 589/05, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The prescribed number of days within which the Auditor General is required by subsection 8 (5) of the Act to notify the head of a government office of the results of a further review is seven days excluding Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.  O. Reg. 589/05, s. 2.

content.section: Notice of results of further review
content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 589/05, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 589/05, s. 3.

content.section: Notice of results of further review
